revision.revremark:
ReadSegy.m : Corrected SH.time to reflect proper traveltime Disabled Waitbar
ReadSegyHeader.m : Fixed 'SkipData' conflict with Robust Control Toolbox
wiggle.m : Allowed specification of line color, allow overlaying wiggle plots allow NaN value in 'VA' style plotting
ReadSu : Fixed typo in line 221
MergeSegy.m : Added mfile to merge Segy Files
Added 'ReadSegyTraceHeaderValue' and 'WriteSegyTraceHeaderValue' that can be used to read and write the TraceHeaderValues one by one. Much faster that reading the whole dataset.
Updated GUI to work for Matlab R2008a. Enabled loading of partial segyfile (using time and header ranges) from GUI (ctrl X). Enabled editing of the textual file header (both ASCII and EBCDIC)
Kristian Stormark contributed a change to GetSegyTraceHeader that reduce the number of discoperations causing a significant speed up.
Urs Boeniger contributed a patch that allows arbitrary SegyTraceHeaders to be specified for WriteSegy.m.
Fixed a bug taht casue a fixed length of 5011 samples in ReadSu.
Cleaning up code to work with Octave 2.1.57.
Cleaning up some Matlab 7.0 specific bugs.
